text: Alexandru Lăpușan (1 February 1955 - 17 May 2016) was a Romanian politician. He served as Minister of Agriculture from 1992 through 1996. He was member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1990 through 1992. He was born in Țăndărei, Romania. Lăpușan died on 17 May 2016, aged 61. ==References== ==Other websites== *Alexandru Lăpușan on Chamber of Deputies official site. title: Alexandru Lăpușan
